solutions_step1_desc: Explore our diverse range of forklifts available for sale or rent. We offer a wide selection to meet your specific needs.
solutions_step2_desc: Browse through our inventory, choose the items you need, and easily book them for the required time.
solutions_step3_desc: Our team ensures prompt delivery to your designated location. Knowledgeable support is always available.
service_subtitle: Professional maintenance, high-quality spare parts, and certified support across Uzbekistan.
service_card_1_desc: Certified mechanics providing scheduled maintenance and professional repair services.
service_card_2_desc: Large inventory of genuine HELI spare parts for all forklift types and models.
service_card_3_desc: Official warranty services handled by HELI-certified specialists in Uzbekistan.
why_choose_desc: We offer complete support across Uzbekistan — from regular maintenance to emergency repairs.
assist_desc: Our experts are ready to help you with diagnostics, service, and spare parts.
about_sub: Leading Forklift Distributor & Service Partner in Uzbekistan
about_who_text1: HELI Uzbekistan is the official distributor of HELI forklifts — one of the world’s top manufacturers with over six decades of engineering excellence.
about_who_text2: Our goal is to help customers increase productivity through reliable material-handling solutions.
about_mission_text: To deliver world-class forklifts and outstanding technical service that empowers industries in Uzbekistan.
about_mission_card1_text: HELI products meet international standards of durability and reliability.
about_mission_card2_text: Modern engineering solutions for better efficiency and performance.
about_mission_card3_text: Full support from equipment selection to long-term service.
about_time_2010: HELI enters Uzbekistan with its first distributor network.
about_time_2015: Service centers expanded across major regions of the country.
about_time_2020: Launched full-scale spare parts and maintenance operations.
about_time_2024: Became the leading HELI equipment supplier in Uzbekistan.
about_cta_text: Contact our team to learn more about HELI solutions.
contact_sub: We are here to help you with forklifts, service, and spare parts.
contact_cta_text: Our team will contact you shortly.
